action.description: The task or activity to be performed (i.e., the 'verb').

target.description: The object of the Action. The Action is performed on the Target.

args.description: Additional information that applies to the Command.

actuator.description: The subject of the Action. The Actuator executes the Action on the Target.

status_text.description: A free-form human-readable description of the Response status

results.description: Map of key:value pairs that contain additional results based on the invoking Command.

oneOf.description: Systematic examination of some aspect of the entity or its environment.
Find an object physically, logically, functionally, or by organization.
Initiate a request for information.
Prevent a certain event or action from completion, such as preventing a flow from reaching a destination or preventing access.
Isolate a file, process, or entity so that it cannot modify or access assets or processes.
Remove an entity (e.g., data, files, flows).
Task the recipient to aggregate and report information as it pertains to a security event or incident.
Task the recipient to eliminate a vulnerability or attack point.

device.description: The properties of a hardware device.

features.description: A set of items used with the query Action to determine an Actuator's capabilities.

start_time.description: The specific date/time to initiate the Command

stop_time.description: The specific date/time to terminate the Command

duration.description: The length of time for an Command to be in effect

response_requested.description: The type of Response required for the Command: `none`, `ack`, `status`, `complete`.

versions.description: List of OpenC2 language versions supported by this Actuator

items.description: List of OpenC2 language versions supported by this Actuator

profiles.description: List of profiles supported by this Actuator

pairs.description: List of targets applicable to each supported Action

rate_limit.description: Maximum number of requests per minute supported by design or policy

Action-Targets.title: Action Targets
Action-Targets.description: Map of each action supported by this actuator to the list of targets applicable to that action

Targets.title: Targets
Targets.description: List of JSON Pointers to Target types

oneOf.description: Processing - an interim Response used to inform the Producer that the Consumer has accepted the Command but has not yet completed it.
OK - the Command has succeeded.
BadRequest - the Consumer cannot process the Command due to something that is perceived to be a Producer error (e.g., malformed Command syntax).
Unauthorized - the Command Message lacks valid authentication credentials for the target resource or authorization has been refused for the submitted credentials.
Forbidden - the Consumer understood the Command but refuses to authorize it.
NotFound - the Consumer has not found anything matching the Command.
InternalError - the Consumer encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from performing the Command.
NotImplemented - the Consumer does not support the functionality required to perform the Command.
ServiceUnavailable - the Consumer is currently unable to perform the Command due to a temporary overloading or maintenance of the Consumer.

hostname.description: A hostname that can be used to connect to this device over a network

idn_hostname.description: An internationalized hostname that can be used to connect to this device over a network

device_id.description: An identifier that refers to this device within an inventory or management system

Features.title: Features
Features.description: An array of zero to ten names used to query an Actuator for its supported capabilities.

name.description: The name of the file as defined in the file system

path.description: The absolute path to the location of the file in the file system

hashes.description: One or more cryptographic hash codes of the file contents

Properties.title: Properties
Properties.description: A list of names that uniquely identify properties of an Actuator.

Feature.title: Feature
Feature.description: Specifies the results to be returned from a query features Command

List of supported Actions and applicable Targets

IDN-Hostname.title: IDN Hostname
IDN-Hostname.description: Internationalized Internet host name as specified in [[RFC5890]](#rfc5890), Section 2.3.2.3.

Nsid.title: Nsid
Nsid.description: A short identifier that refers to a namespace.
